summary: This document outlines the Know Your Customer (KYC) details for Jeffrey Epstein and associated individuals related to the account of Prytanee LLC at Deutsche Bank. It includes information on account ownership, relationships, and the financial backgrounds of the individuals involved, highlighting Epstein's role as a significant client and the structure of his financial dealings. This document contains detailed information about various legal entities associated with Jeffrey Epstein, including Southern Trust Company and The Rene Trust. It outlines their organizational structures, ownership details, and financial activities, highlighting Epstein's role as the sole shareholder of Southern Trust and the trustee of The Rene Trust.
